about_the_game:
Azure Orphanage is an SRPG game developed by cominami, and published by OTAKU Plan.



There was a war called the "Great War," a long-lasting war between the "Solaha Kingdom" and the "Empire."
Facing the Empire, which summoned demons using forbidden magic and overwhelmed its opponents with unknown forces, the Solaha Kingdom barely achieved victory by utilizing military power and wisdom.
Shortly after the war ended, the emperor passed away, and the Empire quietly vanished from history.
The orphaned survivors from the Empire were taken in by the compassionate Solaha priest, "Ron," and were sheltered in an orphanage called "Azure."
More than 20 years later, the orphans, ridiculed as "LOSERS" and facing discrimination, lived quietly in a corner of Solaha in poverty.
One day, while secretly searching for the Empire's heritage, orphan Nina encounters a "demon," believed to be a survivor of the war, in an unexplored cave.
At the same time, various incidents unfold, gradually devouring the orphans’ daily lives...
In the "time loop," will they grasp hope or despair? The story of defying fate surrounding "Azure" was just about to begin.



◇◆Mysteries and Foreshadowing Galore◆◇
Filled with numerous enigmas and an intense, and immoral "innocence-falling" storyline, you'll be drawn deeper into the "Azure Orphanage" with each shocking revelation. Brace yourself for the astounding conclusion, where all the mysteries are unveiled and the suspenseful foreshadowing comes to fruition.

◇◆Smooth Pixel Animations◆◇
・Original custom pixel art for each heroine! Watch them move smoothly with different motions for each weapon!
・Experience combined attacks and flashy cut-ins as well!
・Pixel animations of monsters assaulting the characters are also included!

◇◆No Worries if You Dislike or Struggle with SRPGs◆◇
・A "Cleared Space" feature allows you to avoid SRPG combat if you prefer.
・Skipping battles still results in level-ups! A summary of the skipped portion will also be displayed.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains dirty language and mature topics that may not suit for minors. Please consider play or not.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
